Index.heroSubtitle: Excellence in Manufacturing. Leadership in Distribution. Integration in Care.
Index.heroDescription: We are a fully integrated pharmaceutical entity, covering all of Egypt through a robust distribution network of over 6,000 pharmacies, 450 employees, and 59 vehicles.
Index.featureDesc1: All our products meet the highest pharmaceutical standards
Index.featureDesc2: Professional healthcare advice from certified pharmacists
Index.featureDesc3: Get your medications delivered quickly to your doorstep
Index.customersDescription: Trusted pharmacies across Egypt that rely on us to deliver high-quality pharmaceutical products and exceptional service.
Index.suppliersDescription: Leading pharmaceutical companies that partner with us to provide high-quality products to serve our customers better.

Metadata.title: Healthy Pharma | HealthyCure - Pharmaceutical Company Egypt
Metadata.description: Healthy Pharma - Leading pharmaceutical manufacturer and distributor in Egypt. HealthyCure products: Omepure, Germitin, AlfaMore, AlfaFresh, AlfaDrink, Choclocal, Irovit. Omega-3, vitamins, supplements. 6000+ pharmacies network.
Metadata.keywords: Healthy Pharma, HealthyCure, Healthy Cure, Omepure, Germitin, AlfaMore, AlfaFresh, AlfaDrink, Choclocal, Irovit, pharmaceutical company Egypt, drug distributor, pharmaceutical manufacturer, dietary supplements, omega-3, vitamins, Egyptian pharmacies, Mansoura, هلثي فارما, هلثي كيور, أوميبيور, جيرميتين

AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.subtitle: Your Health is Our Responsibility
AboutUs.heroDescription: We are a fully integrated pharmaceutical entity, covering all of Egypt through a robust distribution network of over 6,000 pharmacies, 450 employees, and 59 vehicles.
AboutUs.description: We are a fully integrated pharmaceutical entity, covering all of Egypt through a robust distribution network of over 6,000 pharmacies, 450 employees, and 59 vehicles.
AboutUs.missionDescription: To provide accessible, high-quality pharmaceutical products and services to all communities across Egypt, ensuring the well-being of our customers through innovation, integrity, and excellence.
AboutUs.visionDescription: To be the leading pharmaceutical company in Egypt and the Middle East, providing innovative healthcare solutions that improve the quality of life for our customers.
AboutUs.whoWeAreDescription: Healthy Pharmaceutical & Medical Industries is a pioneering pharmaceutical company dedicated to improving healthcare across Egypt. With decades of experience in pharmaceutical manufacturing and distribution, we have established ourselves as a trusted name in the industry.
AboutUs.whatWeDoDescription: We manufacture and distribute high-quality pharmaceutical products, dietary supplements, and medical supplies. Our comprehensive portfolio includes HealthyCure brand products such as Omepure, Germitin, AlfaMore, and many more trusted medications.

quality.title: Quality Excellence
quality.description: We maintain the highest standards in pharmaceutical manufacturing and distribution, certified by ISO 9001:2015 and GSDP.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously developing and introducing new pharmaceutical solutions to meet evolving healthcare needs.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Operating with transparency, honesty, and ethical practices in all our business operations.

customer.title: Customer Focus
customer.description: Prioritizing customer satisfaction and well-being in everything we do, from product development to distribution.

certifications.title: Certified Excellence
certifications.description: Our commitment to quality is validated by international certifications
certifications.gsdp: GSDP - Good Storage and Distribution Practices

cta.title: Ready to Partner with Us?
cta.description: Join thousands of pharmacies across Egypt trusting Healthy Pharma for quality pharmaceutical products.

ContactUs.title: Contact Us
ContactUs.subtitle: Get in Touch
ContactUs.description: We would love to hear from you. Please feel free to reach out to us.
ContactUs.addressValue: 17 Sherif El-Rady St., Old Tawriel, Mansoura, Egypt

OurVision.title: Our Vision
OurVision.subtitle: Excellence in Healthcare
OurVision.description: To be the leading pharmaceutical company in Egypt and the Middle East, providing innovative healthcare solutions that improve the quality of life for our customers.
OurVision.content: We strive to create a healthier future by delivering high-quality pharmaceutical products and services. Our vision is to be recognized as a trusted partner in healthcare, committed to excellence, innovation, and customer satisfaction.

leadership.title: Market Leadership
leadership.description: Become the #1 pharmaceutical distributor in Egypt and expand to the Middle East region.

innovation.title: Innovation Excellence
innovation.description: Continuously develop cutting-edge pharmaceutical solutions that meet evolving healthcare needs.

quality.title: Quality Standards
quality.description: Maintain the highest international quality standards in all our products and services.

accessibility.title: Healthcare Accessibility
accessibility.description: Make quality pharmaceutical products accessible to every community across Egypt.

future.title: Looking to the Future
future.content: We envision a future where every Egyptian has access to high-quality, affordable pharmaceutical products. Our commitment to innovation, quality, and customer service drives us to continuously improve and expand our offerings.

cta.title: Join Us in Our Vision
cta.description: Partner with us to create a healthier future for Egypt and the Middle East.

OurMission.title: Our Mission
OurMission.subtitle: Committed to Your Health
OurMission.description: To provide accessible, high-quality pharmaceutical products and services to all communities across Egypt, ensuring the well-being of our customers through innovation, integrity, and excellence.
OurMission.content: Our mission is to manufacture and distribute pharmaceutical products that meet the highest international standards. We are committed to continuous improvement, research and development, and building strong relationships with our customers and partners.

manufacturing.title: Quality Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Produce pharmaceutical products that exceed international quality standards and regulatory requirements.

distribution.title: Reliable Distribution
distribution.description: Ensure timely and safe delivery of medications to 6,000+ pharmacies across Egypt through our certified GSDP network.

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: Invest in research and development to bring new and improved pharmaceutical solutions to market.

service.title: Customer Excellence
service.description: Build lasting partnerships with pharmacies and healthcare providers through exceptional service and support.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.content: We approach every aspect of our business with integrity, professionalism, and a deep commitment to improving healthcare outcomes. From manufacturing to distribution, every step is guided by our mission to serve the health needs of Egyptian communities.

cta.title: Partner with Excellence
cta.description: Join our network of trusted pharmacy partners and deliver quality healthcare to your community.

Certificate.title: Our Certifications
Certificate.subtitle: Quality and Compliance Excellence
Certificate.description: Our certifications demonstrate our unwavering commitment to quality, safety, and regulatory compliance in pharmaceutical manufacturing and distribution.
Certificate.content: We maintain the highest standards of quality assurance and regulatory compliance. Our facilities are certified and regularly audited to ensure we meet international pharmaceutical manufacturing standards.
Certificate.pageDescription: Healthy Pharma certifications - ISO 9001:2015, GSDP, and pharmaceutical quality standards. View our official certificates demonstrating compliance with international pharmaceutical storage, distribution and quality management regulations.

gsdp.title: GSDP Certificate
gsdp.fullTitle: Good Storage and Distribution Practices Certification
gsdp.description: Our GSDP certification validates that our pharmaceutical storage and distribution operations meet the highest standards. This certification ensures that pharmaceutical products are stored and distributed under controlled conditions maintaining their quality and integrity throughout the supply chain.
features: Proper storage conditions and temperature control

iso.title: ISO 9001:2015
iso.description: Our ISO 9001:2015 certification demonstrates our commitment to maintaining a robust quality management system for import and export of pharmaceutical, food supplements, and cosmetics products. This international standard ensures we consistently provide products and services that meet customer and regulatory requirements.
iso.issuedBy: Eriva Certificate of Approval - IAF Accredited
